TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content:
"Not thrust-y enough to cause damage, try this Mainsail!"

*Toss*
Still weeping but prepared the miniature nuke in meh backpack.
"How many people are in this elevator?!?"

Saying i don't know, placing the nuke on the ground, and setting the timer for 2:00. pushing floor 999 button. thinking, I'll make it in time! then pushing the 1 button so the elevator will be gone (and the nuke) once i get to my floor!

wait how are we even still in the elevator ?

(and you really should not have said brony becuase well google has all sorts of stuff )

Edited September 30, 2013 by briansun1
I have no idea. At all.
We are now at meh floor. i activate the nuke, but on the indestructible wrap, and throw it in the elevator. i then get off at meh floor. have fun getting nuked!

Nukes, so 1,000,000 years ago. Psh. Primitives...

The stuff is Neoldyium Planetary Buster.

you're right!

-Jumps ON the elevator, places the dark/red/light/green/blue/yellow matter bomb, with the new top class military Xenon bomb!(it glows!) and jumps back to floor 998 and takes the stairs to floor 999!-

I cast as many white magics as possible to keep the nasty wing-ged demon thing away from me.

Then I do a Kung Fu pose!

YA!
the bomb explodes, destroying all life on kerbin, while i safely leave the soi. then, the elevator gets rebuilt on laythe, costing everyone (but me) 1,000,000 points and 1 life!
You really should not have said brony becuase well google has all sorts of stuff

Nobody seems to be paying attention to my world domination speech, so i shoot Everyone.

For the Lulz :3

You? World domination? HA!

Surrender now to the almighty Reptilians!

Or else...
Yus. (takes over the world)
"All sort of stuff, What do you mean Brian? O_o "
Click me and find out
"I don't know what I've been expecting..."
World domination success. bow down mortals.
no, why should I? you should bow down to me
I am Optimus, protector of the Human race- I shall do whatever I can to protect them! *uses cannons on whatver alien that is*
I am no alien... just human in Bad@$$ armor

"Space Marine, Yeah! It's like an army of Chuck Norris, kicking the ass of aliens"

(Wait, i'm an alien...)

I don't always get stuck in elevators with aliens...

but when do, I get out through the escape hatch...

Stay Xenophobic, my friends.

"no, you no get ice cream"
Why not????
